infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: LinusCam needs camera access to capture photos with voice notes.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: LinusCam needs microphone access to record voice notes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: LinusCam needs photo library access to save your photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: LinusCam needs permission to save photos to your library.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: LinusCam uses speech recognition to transcribe your voice notes.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow LinusCam to access your camera to capture photos.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow LinusCam to access your microphone to record voice notes.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow LinusCam to save photos to your library.
